name: Allison Transmission Holdings, Inc.
description: Allison Transmission Holdings, Inc. is a leading designer and manufacturer of automatic transmissions and hybrid propulsion systems for commercial vehicles. Established in 1915 and headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana, Allison has built a reputation for engineering excellence, quality, and innovation within the transportation industry. The company’s products are utilized in a variety of applications, including medium- and heavy-duty trucks, buses, and military vehicles, serving customers in over 100 countries worldwide. Allison's commitment to sustainability and efficiency is evident in its advanced technologies aimed at reducing fuel consumption and emissions, while also enhancing vehicle performance and drivability. The company offers a comprehensive portfolio of transmission products, including the 1000 Series, 2000 Series, and 3000 Series, which are renowned for their durability and reliability. Additionally, Allison is focusing on the development of electrification solutions to meet the evolving demands of the commercial vehicle market. With a strong emphasis on customer service and support, Allison Transmission continues to lead the way in the automatic transmission industry, shaping the future of mobility for commercial applications.
